title: Move In Special! 2 Bed 2 Bath - International District
posting_body: At Metropolitan Park Apartments, we offer spacious, beautifully designed, one and two bedroom homes featuring brand new interiors.
Our homes have sleek stainless steel appliances, minimalist white European cabinetry, modern hardwood style flooring, plush high end carpeting, bright lighting, and smooth satin nickel finishes.
With ample storage, full sized washers/dryers, and over-sized patios and balconies, Metropolitan Park meets all your needs and more.
Metropolitan Park boasts a 95/100 walk-score, centrally located in International District, within walking distance to Downtown, Capitol Hill and Pioneer Square.
Our location is the bridge between all that Seattle, WA has to offer.
Take in breathtaking views of Puget Sound and Downtown from our rooftop deck, and you'll see just how much you have access to.
Our 24 hour fitness center, complete with dry sauna, and our on-site 24 hour maintenance, make our community the perfect place for comfortable Seattle living.
We are just an easy 5 minutes to King's Station, giving access to all Seattle metro's major bus and link routes.

Whether you're explore the exciting culture of International District, taking a walk in Kobe Garden, or lounging on our rooftop deck, our community provides the space and location you need to have it all.
Schedule a personalized tour of Metropolitan Park today to discover how much better life can be!
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 840 Sq.
- Available Gated Garage with Electronic Entrance
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
